thread.title: Greek PM Alexis Tsipras says does not have mandate to exit eurozone
thread.title_full: Greek PM Alexis Tsipras says does not have mandate to exit eurozone | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Greek PM Alexis Tsipras says does not have mandate to exit eurozone
text:
Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras appealed to his Syriza lawmakers on Friday to back a fiscal plan in return for aid from creditors, a government official said, in a last-ditch attempt to stave off financial meltdown.
Tsipras is seeking approval from Syriza for a government blueprint of reforms in return for new aid from international creditors.
“We are confronted with crucial decisions,” a government official Quote: d Tspiras telling lawmakers. “We got a mandate to bring better deal than the ultimatum that the Eurogroup gave us, but certainly not given a mandate to take Greece out of the eurozone.”
“We are all in this together.”
For Updates Check Economy News ; follow us on Facebook and Twitter
 1:50 pm
